patthana13.8:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they wake up to sleep.
patthana13.8:0.3_0: and seeing the danger in attachments.
patthana13.8:1.0_0: ‘ cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause reason cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause reason cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause the reason cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause the reason cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause the reason cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause the reason cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause
patthana13.8:1.1_0: Understanding should be given up by seeing.
patthana13.8:1.1_1: Seeing this, you should give up causes and conditions that should not be given up.
patthana13.8:1.1_2: By seeing, you should give up the teaching to anyone they’ve given up, relying on not developed.
patthana13.8:1.1_3: Things given up, you should not give up the teachings, but should be given up by seeing.
patthana13.8:1.1_4: Seeing this, you should give up dangerous seeing. You should not give up the things that should be given up. Thought arise because of seeing.
patthana13.8:2.1_0: You should not give up the teachings that should be given up by developing.
patthana13.8:3.1_0: Without developing or cultivating you should not give up three things.
patthana13.8:4.1_0: Without seeing, you should give up the going forth and the three things that should be given up neither by seeing.
patthana13.8:5.1_0: By developing, they should give up the three things that should be given up neither by developing nor cultivating.
patthana13.8:7.1_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 35.124.)
